mainSequence.step: Publisher requests Preview of Data Package from UI Interface
UI Interface verifies Publisher Identity with Publisher Account
UI Interface prepares Data Package for Preview with Data Package Service
Data Package Service validates Data Package with Validation Service
Validation Service provides Validation Results to Data Package Service
Data Package Service sends Validated Data Package to Preview Service
Preview Service generates Preview Link and sends it to Data Package Service
Data Package Service provides Preview Link to UI Interface
UI Interface displays Preview Link to Publisher
